thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 19 of 260
thread.title: Kristine

author: Kristine
title: Kristine
text: For the 2nd year in a row,I have purchased the driving experience for my son. last year, the company had a difficult time entertaining a venue that was not promised as stated by Groupon. This year, I purchased the driving experience and the company said it will not be held in Indy this year. THey have stated to Groupon to stop selling this product but it is still out there. It cost $159 and has to be booked in 90'days. There is no where to book!
